about_the_game:
Step into the thrilling world of Bruteforce. In the diverse landscapes of Etheria, you're pitted against enigmatic monsters and unpredictable challenges. Each battle offers an opportunity to adapt, strategize, and grow stronger. Claim victory, and you'll be rewarded with gold and valuable items; face defeat, and you'll find lessons that only make you fiercer.

Experience the action:

  • Customize Your Hero: Choose your class, fine-tune their talents, and equip them with gear that complements your desired build.

  • Legendary Impact: Discover legendary items that not only boost your power but can entirely reshape your combat style and strategy.

  • Progressive Power: Gain instant benefits with in-battle level-ups, and cement your hero's strengths with enduring progression over time.

  • Intense Combat: Immerse yourself in battles where every decision, every move, counts.

  • Varied Terrains of Etheria: Navigate through shifting terrains, each offering its own set of challenges and rewards.

  • Engage in Events: Opt to assist civilians for rewards, seek the help of the army for an upper hand against bosses, or raid mob camps for valuable loot.

  • Always a New Challenge: With procedurally generated maps, every journey is a fresh adventure.

Key Features:

  • Play It Your Way: Embrace challenges solo or join forces with friends.

  • Gear Galore: A diverse array of items awaits, each with the potential to refine or redefine your strategy.

  • Destructible Environment: Use the surroundings to your advantage, and don't shy away from causing some destruction.

  • Varied Modes: Beyond the core experience, explore modes like the relentless Endless challenges, Competitive Ladder with hand-crafted maps and changing conditions, and the pulse-racing Boss Rush.

Dive into Bruteforce, where every game is a fresh challenge waiting to be conquered. Are you ready?

name: Bruteforce

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Core i3 (7100)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 / AMD RX 570 4Gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Core i5 (10700)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2070 8Gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 11 GB available space

short_description: Bruteforce is a dark techno-fantasy top-down ARPG where players combat hordes of foes, exploring diverse biomes. Face intense challenges, risk losing treasures upon death, but emerge victorious to reap immense rewards.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
